verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> had a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6099>great<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4735>cattle<s%>: and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H4725>that<s%>, behold, the place was a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle<s%>;

the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and unto the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Ataroth <S%H5852><s%>, and <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, and <S%H5247>Nimrah<s%>, and <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>, and <S%H7643>Sebam<s%>, and <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, and <S%H1194>Beon<s%>,

the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, is a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle<s%>; and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, If we have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, let this <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%>; bring us not <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, Shall your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4421>war<s%>, and shall ye sit <S%H3427>here<s%>?

And wherefore discourage <S%H5106>ye<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from going <S%H5674>over<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath given <S%H5414>them<s%>?
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, when I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

For when they went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, they <S%H5106>discouraged<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they should not <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had given <S%H5414>them<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and he <S%H7650>sware<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Surely <S%H518><s%> none of the <S%H582>men<s%> that came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; because they have not <S%H4390>wholly<s%> followed <S%H310>me<s%>:

save <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>; because they have <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he made them <S%H5128>wander<s%> to and fro in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, until all the <S%H1755>generation<s%>, that had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, was <S%H8552>consumed<s%>.

And <S%H6965><s%>, behold, ye are risen up in your <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H8635>stead<s%>, an increase of <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, to <S%H5595>augment<s%> yet the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> toward <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For if ye turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3254>him<s%>, he will yet again <S%H3240>leave<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and ye will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all this <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And they came <S%H5066>near<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, and said, We will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1448>sheepfolds<s%> here for our <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for our little <S%H2945>ones<s%>:

but we <S%H587>ourselves<s%> will be <S%H2363>ready<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> to go <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, until we have <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto their <S%H4725>place<s%>: and our little <S%H2945>ones<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.
We will not <S%H7725>return<s%> unto our <S%H1004>houses<s%>, until the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

For we will not <S%H5157>inherit<s%> with them on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and <S%H1973>forward<s%>; because our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H935>fallen<s%> to us on this <S%H5676>side<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>them<s%>, If ye will do this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, if ye will <S%H2502>arm<s%> yourselves to go <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to the <S%H4421>war<s%>,

and every <S%H2502>armed<s%> man of you will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, until he hath driven <S%H3423>out<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> from before <S%H6440>him<s%>,

and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; then <S%H310>afterward<s%> ye shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> towards <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and towards <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and this <S%H776>land<s%> shall be unto you for a <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
But if ye will not do <S%H6213>so<s%>, <S%H2398>behold<s%>, ye have sinned against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and be <S%H3045>sure<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%> will find you <S%H4672>out<s%>.

Build <S%H1129><s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for your <S%H6792>sheep<s%>; and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which hath <S%H3318>proceeded<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth<s%>.
Our little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, our <S%H802>wives<s%>, our <S%H4735>flocks<s%>, and all our <S%H929>cattle<s%>, shall be there in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>;

but thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> will pass <S%H5674>over<s%>, every man that is <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, as my <S%H3068>lord<s%> <S%H1696>saith<s%>.

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> gave <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning them to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>them<s%>, If the children of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> will pass with you <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, every man that is <S%H2502>armed<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5414>you<s%>; then ye shall give them the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%>:
but if they will not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> with you <S%H2502>armed<s%>, they shall have <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, so will we <S%H6213>do<s%>.

We <S%H5168>will<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and the <S%H272>possession<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall remain with us <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H1121>them<s%>, even to the children of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and unto the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, the <S%H776>land<s%>, according to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof with their <S%H1367>borders<s%>, even the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1769>Dibon<s%>, and <S%H5852>Ataroth<s%>, and <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>,
and <S%H5855>Atrothshophan<s%>, and <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, and <S%H3011>Jogbehah<s%>,
and <S%H1039>Beth-nimrah<s%>, and <S%H1028>Beth-haran<s%>: <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>sheep<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>, and <S%H7156>Kiriathaim<s%>,

and <S%H5015>Nebo<s%>, and <S%H1186>Baal-meon<s%>, (their <S%H8034>names<s%> being <S%H4142>changed<s%>,) and <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>: and they <S%H7121>gave<s%> other <S%H8034>names<s%> unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which they <S%H1129>builded<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H3423>it<s%>, and dispossessed the Amorites that were <S%H567>therein<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; and he dwelt <S%H3427>therein<s%>.
And <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H2333>towns<s%> <S%H7121>thereof<s%>, and called them <S%H2334>Havvoth-jair<s%>.

And <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H7079>Kenath<s%>, and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> <S%H7121>thereof<s%>, and called it <S%H5025>Nobah<s%>, after his own <S%H8034>name<s%>.
